name: Manhunter
description: When John "Striker" Gullivan left the SAS, he's been far from thinking about retirement. A skilled sniper, veteran of many covert operations, he was ready to take on the less legal side of the "business".
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7 Processor: Pentium Dual Core processor or similar Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Video Adapter compatible with DirectX 9.0c (Pixel Shader 3) with 512 MB RAM

reviews.review_text: ♥♥♥♥ ass game.  'Press any key to start' I press space bar and my computer overheats. When I restart it the game says I failed and have to start again. Start a new game. Game is still saved at the last games checkpoint where I can no longer spawn in. ♥♥♥♥ off devs  0.8/8 Manhunter.exe can not communicate   EDIT: Finally got game working by reinstalling. Gets past first cutscene Spawns in ground and cannot move...
you know you're in for a modern gaming masterpiece when you have 12 minutes playtime and have already lost the will to live.
I should have just bought more copies of Bad Rats
I think this is the best task manager simulator of 2015  If i had one program that taught me how to close other programs through task amnager it was this one  Great game 420/911

This Game is seriously flawed. It made big promises that turned out to be bluffs. there is little stealth no immersive story and the character animations are abismal. Avoid this at all costs if you are a fan of games like Sniper Ghost Warrior or even just a fan of Sniper styled first person stealth games.
Think of CoD and then make it 10 times more ♥♥♥♥♥♥. That's this game.

Oh boy where to start! just before i start this i was on the urge to commiting sucide (jk lol xd) 1) the game just about loads. 2) the music... the music kill's your ears. 3) the gun models take up half the god dam screen. 4) i didn't know how 'Davies' looks like so i killed him and i had to start the mission again... 5) when you get dropped of it looks like you hovered of instead 6) you are so close to the Enemies they give you sniper rifles that zoom in so ♥♥♥♥ing close that you can see the 'good' detail on the Enemies.  Im Pretty Sure That Theres More But I Just Got Pass The Cut Sence When You Meet Up With Davies Then I Stopped...   PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS EVEN IF ITS ON SALE!   One Last Word Before I Go. My friend brought this for me as a gag xD

Looks just like a FPS Tablet game from about 3 years ago that I played. I didn't enjoy that game,  I started the game, went through a bad slow loading screen, even on max settings the game really doesn't look that great, not exactly overwhelmed at this point, kill some enemies, get out of the chopper kill some more enemies, got to an annoying unskippable cutscene with terrible voice acting, got through a village got told 'Go through this canyon' I walked through the canyon, it said 'Come back you've gone to far' So I walk backwards and walk straight in to a cutscene, the timer continues to count down DURING the cutscene and because of that it says I failed the mission, click LMB or Esc to restart.. They don't work, check task manager, the game froze.. I've played games before.. Then there's this, it's like a cheap tablet game that you can get on the App Store or Google Play for roughly the same price, in fact it feels like a port from a tablet game, which is why it's so horrible, plot is weak, no actually backstory, I literally couldn't get far because the game was just pure bad design, I restarted the game after the crash, and the continue from last save sort of option was not available. Which means after the crash it deleted my save, GG Silden.. Also what the ♥♥♥♥ is up with the publisher? KISS ltd? So tell me then can I go and request a refund Gene Simmons? Because I dislike this game to the point I want my 2 quid back?
This game is amazing.

When it's good it's good when it's bad it's horrible. level 9 when it's time to stop the rocket from going off, 6 min. is crazy, because the player moves to slow. At times when you try to climb a ladder you get on it and freeze and shake. The weapons misfire and they ♥♥♥♥ after every shot during the heat of battle. I'm at level 9 one or the other ladder freezes and shakes, I have to reload saved game, ♥♥♥♥♥♥ off. But if they fix these flaws the game can be decent.

Obviously complete Sh!t. Won't run on many windows 7 X64 bit, or windows 8 X64 bit, just check the message boards. Apparently the developer doesn't care, but it may be a blessing because based on what people say I'm not missing much. A FPS that came out a year ago and is retailing for 5 dollars and is on sale for 74 cents speaks to the quality of the game. turd and a half. 0/10.
THATS RIGHT GET NOSCOPED!!!!
love this game i just wish there was a way for me to do mods on this game.
Dosn´t run on my Laptop under Win7

Never ever purchase this game! Even if it cost pennies don't do it!!!! I actually got it for free and I regret installing it on my machine. I have a stupidly overpowered PC an this runs at about 2-4 frames if Im lucky.

after playing counter strike for a long time, this game lacks graphics and realism. the first person camera jumps up and down so you cant aim. the weapons are so weak and the AI seems to have aimbot for some reason even if you are hiding. i brought this game a while ago when i never played any games like this but after my cs experience i'd say that this is quite a ♥♥♥♥♥♥ game
+ graphics + missions + weapons + ideas - Sounds - No Multiplayer  Good game , Enjoy :)
Got it because of Funhaus. I feel Adam's pain. Absolutely worth it when it's on sale.

No bugs, story rich, shooting and hitting system is one of the best i have ever expirenced in games, voice acting is good, johns (main character) voice is so sexy that my black ♥♥♥♥ is wet all the time, and when i hear the music i nearly ♥♥♥. Maybe soundtrack is same in every level, but still its so good that i listen to it even in the toilet.  Enough jokes. If i were in one room with hitler and designer of this game with two bullets in pistol i would have killed myselft right after the designer
10/10 Better than new Call of Duty
> return to combat zone  best game 10/10
Literally the worst game ever made that i have played! i cant believe that i bought it!  Pros - $.10 when i bought it cons - Everything about the game sucks B****

Low budget feeling, the main voice actor sounds like he also coded the game (ie not a voice actor), but once I got my mouse sensitivity setting adjusted, I've been having a good time with the actual shooting in the game. Feels fairly accurate and can hit headshots from miles away. Fun game for the price.
Oh, my... just don't bother with this one. Not even worth the $0.54 I paid
Won't run, if it does it runs in the background never to be seen, can't be closed by even the Task Manager.  Don't get it.
Its terrible.... And the mouse acceleration killed me too many times.... Do not buy unless you love ♥♥♥♥♥♥ games

Game is SUPER challenging, sometimes when you aim point blank at an enemy it just wont hurt them, other times if you go through an objective before the point comes up, it wont register with the game, AND if you go past the point of no return, unable to get back to teh objective point, then ♥♥♥♥ you, you cant get back to it, you have to restart the game in order to redo it, on the other hand your parter Davies seems to be ♥♥♥♥ing invincible. In other words, 10/10 Manhunter 2 pls
I have played this ♥♥♥♥ing game about 5 minutes and i have already found 3 bugs of it :)  I bought this game becouse it looked so bad that I wanted to test it and laugh for the ♥♥♥♥ing bugs :)
bad graphics lack of story 2/10
NEVER started. I actually tried to run it on many pc but i just wont start. I feel ripped
